typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		AgingMethodology as string,
		MinimalAge as string,
		MaximalAge as string,
		FailureRateAtMinimalAge as string,
		FailureRateAtMaximalAge as string,
		ExternalFailureRatePerYear as string,
		IsQuantityDiscrete as string,
		GFlag as string,
		AgingFailureDelay as string,
		IsAgingAfterDeath as string,
		MaintenanceIfOutOfOrder as string,
		Shape as string,
		Scale as string,
		ExpectedLife as string,
		FinancialCostOfFailure as string,
		EnvironmentalCostOfFailure as string,
		NetworkCostOfFailure as string,
		ExtraNL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadCreateAgingFamilies
ReadCreateAgingFamilies select(mapColumn(
		{$id} = Name,
		AgingMethodology,
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.MinimalAge} = MinimalAge,
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.MaximalAge} = MaximalAge,
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.FailureRateAtMinimalAge} = FailureRateAtMinimalAge,
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.FailureRateAtMaximalAge} = FailureRateAtMaximalAge,
		ExternalFailureRatePerYear,
		IsQuantityDiscrete,
		GFlag,
		AgingFailureDelay,
		IsAgingAfterDeath,
		MaintenanceIfOutOfOrder,
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.Shape} = Shape,
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.Scale} = Scale,
		ExpectedLife,
		FinancialCostOfFailure,
		EnvironmentalCostOfFailure,
		NetworkCostOfFailure,
		ExtraNL),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$metadata.$model} = 'dtmi:AgingFamily;1',
	{$entityDelete} = 'false') ~> ModelDefinition
source(output(
		AgingFamily as string,
		AgentAgingFamily as string,
		HillParameters as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadMapFamilyPairHillParameters
ReadMapFamilyPairHillParameters split(in(['AmplitudeHill','OffsetHill'], HillParameters),
	in(['SlopeHill'], HillParameters),
	in(['IsFailureTransmitted','IsCouplingActive'], HillParameters),
	disjoint: false) ~> MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByType@(MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByfloat, MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByinteger, MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByboolean)
MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByType@MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByfloat aggregate(groupBy(AgingFamily,
		AgentAgingFamily),
	FamilyPairHillParameters = dropRight(dropLeft(toString(keyValues(collect(toString(HillParameters)), collect(toFloat(Value)))) ,1), 1)) ~> AggregateMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByfloat
MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByType@MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByinteger aggregate(groupBy(AgingFamily,
		AgentAgingFamily),
	FamilyPairHillParameters = dropRight(dropLeft(toString(keyValues(collect(toString(HillParameters)), collect(toInteger(Value)))) ,1), 1)) ~> AggregateMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByinteger
MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByType@MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByboolean aggregate(groupBy(AgingFamily,
		AgentAgingFamily),
	FamilyPairHillParameters = dropRight(dropLeft(toString(keyValues(collect(toString(HillParameters)), collect(toBoolean(Value)))) ,1), 1)) ~> AggregateMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByboolean
AggregateMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByfloat, AggregateMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByinteger, AggregateMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersSplitByboolean union(byName: true)~> MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersUnionAllTypes
MapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersUnionAllTypes aggregate(groupBy(AgingFamily,
		AgentAgingFamily),
	FamilyPairHillParameters = collect(FamilyPairHillParameters)) ~> AggregateMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersAllTypes
AggregateMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersAllTypes derive(FamilyPairHillParameters = '{' + concatWS(',', FamilyPairHillParameters[1], FamilyPairHillParameters[2], FamilyPairHillParameters[3]) + '}') ~> DeriveMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersAllTypes
DeriveMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyHillParametersAllTypes aggregate(groupBy(AgingFamily),
	FamilyPairHillParameters = toString(keyValues(collect(toString(AgentAgingFamily)), collect(toString(FamilyPairHillParameters))))) ~> AggregateMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyAgentAgingFamily
AggregateMapFamilyPairHillParametersKeyAgentAgingFamily derive(FamilyPairHillParameters = replace(replace(replace(FamilyPairHillParameters, '"{', '{'), '}"', '}'), '\\', '')) ~> FamilyPairHillParametersCleaning
ModelDefinition, FamilyPairHillParametersCleaning join({$id} == AgingFamily,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto') ~> FamilyPairHillParametersUnion
FamilyPairHillParametersUnion select(mapColumn(
		{$id},
		{AgingMethodology},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.MinimalAge},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.MaximalAge},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.FailureRateAtMinimalAge},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.FailureRateAtMaximalAge},
		{ExternalFailureRatePerYear},
		{IsQuantityDiscrete},
		{GFlag},
		{AgingFailureDelay},
		{IsAgingAfterDeath},
		{MaintenanceIfOutOfOrder},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.Shape},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.Scale},
		{ExpectedLife},
		{FinancialCostOfFailure},
		{EnvironmentalCostOfFailure},
		{NetworkCostOfFailure},
		{ExtraNL},
		{$metadata.$model},
		{$entityDelete},
		FamilyPairHillParameters),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FamilyPairHillParametersSelect
source(output(
		AgingFamily as string,
		HealthIndex as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadMapMapReferenceCostOfFailure
ReadMapMapReferenceCostOfFailure aggregate(groupBy(AgingFamily),
	MapReferenceCostOfFailure = toString(keyValues(collect(toString(HealthIndex)), collect(toFloat(Value))))) ~> AggregateMapMapReferenceCostOfFailureKeyHealthIndex
AggregateMapMapReferenceCostOfFailureKeyHealthIndex derive(MapReferenceCostOfFailure = replace(replace(replace(MapReferenceCostOfFailure, '"{', '{'), '}"', '}'), '\\', '')) ~> MapReferenceCostOfFailureCleaning
FamilyPairHillParametersSelect, MapReferenceCostOfFailureCleaning join({$id} == AgingFamily,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto') ~> MapReferenceCostOfFailureUnion
MapReferenceCostOfFailureUnion select(mapColumn(
		{$id},
		{AgingMethodology},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.MinimalAge},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.MaximalAge},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.FailureRateAtMinimalAge},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.FailureRateAtMaximalAge},
		{ExternalFailureRatePerYear},
		{IsQuantityDiscrete},
		{GFlag},
		{AgingFailureDelay},
		{IsAgingAfterDeath},
		{MaintenanceIfOutOfOrder},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.Shape},
		{EquipmentAgingLawParameters.Scale},
		{ExpectedLife},
		{FinancialCostOfFailure},
		{EnvironmentalCostOfFailure},
		{NetworkCostOfFailure},
		{ExtraNL},
		{$metadata.$model},
		{$entityDelete},
		{FamilyPairHillParameters},
		MapReferenceCostOfFailure),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapReferenceCostOfFailureSelect
MapReferenceCostOfFailureSelect sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_AgingFamilies.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadCreateAgingFamilies select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusAgingFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionAgingFamiliesStatusEditor union(byName: true)~> StatusUpdateAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateAgingFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AgingFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
